name: Morphling
title: Water Elemental
lore: Morphling is a water elemental who can shift his form between strength and agility at will.

waveform.name: Waveform
waveform.description: Morphling becomes a wave of water, damaging enemies as he passes through them.

adaptiveStrike.name: Adaptive Strike
adaptiveStrike.description: Damages and stuns or damages and knocks back based on Morphling's stats.

attributeShift.name: Attribute Shift
attributeShift.description: Morphling can shift points between strength and agility.

replicate.name: Replicate
replicate.description: Creates an illusion of a target hero. Morphling can morph into this illusion.
